Name: Amilyn
description:
Amilyn is a married woman with two children. She is a very hard working entrepreneur. Amilyn is 31 years old and has two children who are in school.

Amilyn has a buy and sell seaweed business in the Philippines. She requested a PHP 9,000 loan amount through NWTF to buy additional seaweeds to sell.

Amilyn has been in this business for several years. In the future, she would like to save money to expand her business.
